prompt: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn from this data?
description: Below are two graphs. The first one shows the world wide consumption of oil over several recent decades. The second graph represents the average concentration of Carbon Dioxide \(CO_{2}\) in the atmosphere, as measured over the middle of the Pacific Ocean, across approximately the same time period as the first graph. Carbon Dioxide is a known by product from the combustion, burning, of fossil fuels like oil.
feedback: The two graphs show a similar increasing trend over the same period of time. This suggests that there is  a relationship between burning oil and the amount of carbon dioxide.
